element.name: TSynEditLines.OwnObjects
element.short: Controls if SynEdit will destroy objects stored in Lines.Objects[] when a line is deleted
element.descr: TSynEdit.Lines.Objects[n] provide storage for objects provided by the user. If this property is set, SynEdit will destroy any objcet stored for a line, if that line is deleted.

element.name: TSynEditLines.OnBeforeDeleteLines
element.short: Event when line(s) are removed from SynEdits textbuffer
element.descr:
This event is called when one or more lines are about to be removed from the SynEdit's textbuffer.
The Sender of the event may be nil, if the lines are changed without BeginUpdate on the editor. If the text buffer is shared, and several editors are in Begin/EndUpdate state, then the Sender is the first editor that was set to be updating.
The event is called before objects are destroyed by Lines.OwnObjects, if that is true.
Durning this event the SynEdit must be treated as read only, with the exception of the SynEdit.Lines.Objects[] property.
